course_title: Microbiology of Food and Beverage Fermentation

001.comments: MICB 202 or BIOC 302 are also acceptable pre-requisites for FNH 405 - please contact LFS Student Services (students@landfood.ubc.ca) for assistance with registration.

description: Fermentation methods, mechanism and microbiology of nonalcoholic fermented foods and alcoholic fermented beverages (beer, cider, sake).
